patterns.description: OAuth client secret (generic pattern)

patterns.name: Database Password
patterns.description: Database connection password

patterns.description: Database connection string with embedded credentials

patterns.name: Stripe API Key
patterns.description: Stripe live secret key (starts with sk_live_)

patterns.description: Slack API token or webhook URL

patterns.name: RSA Private Key
patterns.description: RSA private key in PEM format

patterns.name: SSH Private Key
patterns.description: SSH private key (OpenSSH, EC, or DSA format)

patterns.name: Certificate
patterns.description: X.509 certificate (may or may not be sensitive)

patterns.description: HTTP Basic Authentication base64 encoded credentials

patterns.name: Bcrypt Hash
patterns.description: Bcrypt password hash (may be acceptable in configs)

patterns.description: Hexadecimal key or secret (32-64 characters)

patterns.description: Google Cloud Platform API key (starts with AIza)
